Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

If using the latest HEAD code (this was recently added) you can access the
=
http response HttpMethod object via the CrawlURIs AList
 
HttpMethod method=
 =3D curi.getObject(A_HTTP_TRANSACTION) 
 
The constant A_HTTP_TRANSACTION =
is defined in the interface
CoreAttributeConstants.
 
- Kris
 

-----Origin=
al Message-----
From: Rich Collins [mailto:rcollins@...] 
Sent:=
 2. febr=FAar 2005 16:43
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [=
archive-crawler] Http Response


From your code:

protected void addRespons=
eContent (HttpMethod method, CrawlURI curi) {

The HttpMethod parameter is =
passed to that method.  How to I get access 
to the HttpMethod object from =
the CrawlURI object
that is passed to the innerProcess method of the Proces=
sor class?

Rich Collins
Director of Information Technology
InjuryBoard.com=

rcollins@...
